description:
Carl`s Snubbull is a member of the Super Pok√©mon Battles troupe. Ash Ketchum and Pikachu thought Luchabull was bullying it and came to rescue it. Unfortunately it was just doing a rehearsal and Carl`s Snubbull got mad and bit Ash Ketchum on the arm after it realized that Ellade got injured.
None of its moves were confirmed in the episode although it did use a Bite like move on Ash Ketchum.
name: Bulu (Carl)
